"Genesis Points":
"Genesis Points are a currency that can be used to purchase Build Parts or exchange for items.

It can be obtained from a variety of sources, such as Tasks and GP Trees."

"You can obtain Genesis Points by accessing the GP Tree Build Part.

You can also earn Genesis Points from GP Trees in other players' Creative Spaces, so visiting other players' Spaces will boost your GP income."

"The appearance of the GP Tree changes every day, and the Genesis Points you earn from it changes accordingly.

※You can obtain Genesis Points once per day per Creative Space.

※There is a limit to the total amount of Genesis Points you can obtain per day."
